column5: I had to wash my Bouy o boy survival suit.  I used it for sledding last year. Over heated in it a few times.  The smell............well .....you know. I burn synth oil in sled and it left a dark stain on one leg. I had to hit it hard with the chemical to get the stain out. Now, I need to waterproof it.  I'm sure there are lots of differant products... What should I use? CX
well on my survival suit i used the same stuff that you use for waterproofing tents & canvass it works great just spray on and let dry for a day then spray again it doesnt harm it at all   cheers
